title: Where can I listen to good quality music online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Spotify. Spotify has been my go-to music source for about 2 years now. With spotify premium, there are no ads, and you can download your music on your phone and use it without wifi. Also, there is a web access to spotify where you can play the music right through your computer. Also, they have a HUGE selection, and you can listen to just about any artist you can think of there!
Music for everyone. is $10 a month and has an awesome selection. I love my membership. There really is a ton of good music on there and can listen on the web or smartphone.
